parameter.name: stateTransformation
parameter.label: State Transformation
parameter.description: Transformation pattern used when receiving values. Chain multiple transformations with the mathematical intersection character "∩".

parameter.name: commandTransformation
parameter.label: Command Transformation
parameter.description: Transformation pattern used when sending values. Chain multiple transformations with the mathematical intersection character "∩".

parameter.name: stateExtension
parameter.label: State URL Extension
parameter.description: This value is added to the base URL configured in the thing for retrieving values.

parameter.name: commandExtension
parameter.label: Command URL Extension
parameter.description: This value is added to the base URL configured in the thing for sending values.

parameter.name: escapedUrl
parameter.label: Escaped URL
parameter.description: This specifies whether the URL is already escaped. Applies to the base URL, commandExtension and stateExtension.

parameter.name: stateContent
parameter.label: State Content
parameter.description: Content for state request (only used if method is POST/PUT)

parameter.name: stateTransformation
parameter.label: State Transformation
parameter.description: Transformation pattern used when receiving values. Chain multiple transformations with the mathematical intersection character "∩".

parameter.name: commandTransformation
parameter.label: Command Transformation

parameter.name: commandExtension
parameter.label: Command URL Extension
parameter.description: This value is added to the base URL configured in the thing for sending values.

parameter.name: escapedUrl
parameter.label: Escaped URL
parameter.description: This specifies whether the URL is already escaped. Applies to the base URL, commandExtension and stateExtension.

parameter.name: stateContent
parameter.label: State Content
parameter.description: Content for state request (only used if method is POST/PUT)

parameter.name: onValue
parameter.label: On Value
parameter.description: The value that represents ON

parameter.name: offValue
parameter.label: Off Value
parameter.description: The value that represents OFF

parameter.name: increaseValue
parameter.label: Increase Value
parameter.description: The value that represents INCREASE

parameter.name: decreaseValue
parameter.label: Decrease Value
parameter.description: The value that represents DECREASE

parameter.name: step
parameter.label: Increase/Decrease Step
parameter.description: The value by which the current brightness is increased/decreased if the corresponding command is received

parameter.name: colorMode
parameter.label: Color Mode
parameter.description: Color mode for parsing incoming and sending outgoing values
